arts.ttl: Schick, Boniface deliver as Bayer Leverkusen survives scare against local foe Cologne in German Cup
arts.sum: Patrik Schick kept Bayer Leverkusen in the German Cup and Victor Boniface sent the defending champion into the semifinals with a 3-2 victory over second-division Cologne on Wednesday. Damion Downs shocked the home support by scoring against the run of play in first-half stoppage time – the 10 minutes that were added for the earlier delay — when the American youth international fired inside the left post.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen squeeze past Köln into Pokal semis
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen left it very late to overcome a two-goal deficit at home against 2. Bundesliga side 1. FC Köln to reach the DFB-Pokal semi finals.

arts.ttl: DFB-POKAL PLAYER RATINGS | Bayer Leverkusen 2-2 1.FC Köln (3-2 AET)
arts.sum: In the marquee game of the quarter-finals of the DFB Pokal, Bayer Leverkusen beat 1.FC Köln in a ‘kleiner’ Rhein Derby to progress to the semi-finals, but it was not…

arts.ttl: DFB Pokal: Predicted Bayer Leverkusen v FC Köln XIs: Xabi Alonso to rotate squad
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso is set to make up to four changes when his Bayer Leverkusen side host local rivals FC Köln at the BayArena in Wednesday’s DFB Pokal quarter-final. After making…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid sent Xabi Alonso warning as Serie A giants eye Carlo Ancelotti
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen fire a warning to Real Madrid over their interest in hiring manager Xabi Alonso to replace Roma target Carlo Ancelotti.

arts.ttl: Six candidates for Bundesliga Player of the Month award for January revealed
arts.sum: Players from Bayern Munich, RB Leipzig, Bayer Leverkusen and Werder Bremen are in the running for the Bundesliga Player of the Month award for January.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen hopeful that Xabi Alonso stays at the club beyond this summer
arts.sum: Sport Bild (via @Bayer04Xtra) reports that Bayer Leverkusen are hopeful that Xabi Alonso will stay at the club beyond this summer, despite being linked with a move to Real Madrid. Fernando…

arts.ttl: How Emiliano Buendia and Mario Hermoso are helping Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Emiliano Buendia and Mario Hermoso have already made their Bayer Leverkusen debuts, just days after signing for the Bundesliga champions. Speaking ahead of their DFB Pokal clash against local rivals…

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso next Real Madrid manager gets firm answer as Bayer Leverkusen chief speaks out
arts.sum: The Spaniard has been heavily linked with succeeding Carlo Ancelotti at the Bernabeu

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs FC Köln, DFB-Pokal quarter-final preview: Holders look to take control in derby
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will continue their DFB-Pokal title defence on Wednesday as they welcome local rivals Köln in the quarter-finals of this year's competition.
